description: The Hawks announced that Hunter had surgery on his right wrist and is expected to return in approximately 8 weeks.
The Hawks announced that Okongwu will miss about six months after undergoing surgery on his right shoulder.

Williams is listed as OUT for Wednesday's (Nov. 24) game.

Irving is not with the Nets and there's currently no timetable for when he may return to the team.
Williams is expected to miss the rest of the regular season with a dislocated wrist, according to Adrian Wojnarowski of ESPN.
The Cavs announced that Mobley will miss the next 2-4 weeks with a right elbow sprain.
Sexton underwent surgery on a torn meniscus in his left knee and is expected to miss the rest of the season, according to Adrian Wojnarowski of ESPN.
The Cavs have listed Stevens as OUT for Wednesday's game (Nov. 24) against the Suns.

There's optimism that Warren will be able to play in late December or January, according to Shams Charania of The Athletic.
The Clippers announced that Batum is expected to be out a while as he goes through the league's health and safety protocols.
Leonard underwent surgery in July on his right ACL and there remains no timetable for his return this season.

Oladipo has yet to be cleared for full-court work, according to David Aldridge of The Athletic.
DiVincenzo is still without a timetable to return from a foot injury suffered last season, according to head coach Mike Budenholzer.
Lopez has not played since the Bucks' first game of the season and no timetable has been announced for his return.

Fultz is still without a timetable to return from ACL surgery, according to head coach Jamahl Mosley.

Moore has not played this season and no timetable has been announced for his return.
